title: Aggregation-induced emission-active supramolecular polymers: from controlled preparation to applications
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3CS00017F, Review Article
Beibei Wang, Yuhao Liu, Xueqian Chen, Xiao-Ting Liu, Zhongyi Liu, Chao Lu
This review focuses on the controlled preparation and applications of aggregation-induced emission (AIE)-active supramolecular polymers, aiming to inspire researchers in designing the next generation of novel AIE-active supramolecular polymers.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
